io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.spawn

Class StandardSpawnService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • io.janusproject.services.AbstractDependentService
        • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.spawn.StandardSpawnService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, DependentService, SpawnService

    public class StandardSpawnService
extends AbstractDependentService
implements SpawnService
    Implementation of a spawning service that is based on the other services of the Janus platform.
    Version:
    0.7.0-SNAPSHOT 2017-10-05 16:28:07
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StandardSpawnService.CannotSpawnException
      This exception is thrown when an agent cannot be spawned.
      static class  StandardSpawnService.InvalidSarlSpecificationException
      This exception is thrown when the agent to spawn is not generated according to a valid SARL specification version.
      static class  StandardSpawnService.SpawnDisabledException
      This exception is thrown when the spawning service of agents is disabled.
      static class  StandardSpawnService.SpawnServiceStopException
      This exception is thrown when the spawning service is not running when the killing function on an agent is called.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

      • StandardSpawnService

        @Inject
public new(injector : com.google.inject.Injector,
                   sarlSpecificationChecker : SarlSpecificationChecker)
        Constructs the service with the given (injected) injector.
        Parameters:
        injector - the injector that should be used by this service for creating the agents.
        sarlSpecificationChecker - the tool for checking the validity of the SARL specification supported by the agents to launch.

      • getServiceDependencies

        public def getServiceDependencies() : Collection<Class<? extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service>> 
        Description copied from interface: DependentService
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        If one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will way until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Specified by:
        getServiceDependencies in interface DependentService
        Overrides:
        getServiceDependencies in class AbstractDependentService
        Returns:
        the dependencies.
        See Also:
        DependentService.getServiceWeakDependencies()

      • spawn

        public def spawn(nbAgents : int,
                 spawningAgent : UUID,
                 parent : AgentContext,
                 agentID : UUID,
                 agentClazz : Class<? extends Agent>,
                 params : Object*) : List<UUID> 
        Description copied from interface: SpawnService
        Spawn agents of the given type, and pass the parameters to its initialization function.
        Specified by:
        spawn in interface SpawnService
        Parameters:
        nbAgents - the number of agents to spawn.
        spawningAgent - the agent which is spawning.
        parent - the parent entity that is creating the agents.
        agentID - the identifier of the agent to spawn. If null the identifier is randomly selected. If nbAgents is greater than 1, the agent identifier must be null.
        agentClazz - the type of the agents to spawn.
        params - the list of the parameters to pass to the agent initialization function.
        Returns:
        the identifiers of the agents, never null.
